name: Bounce The Ball (Thunder Knight)
description:
Bounce The Ball!

A Fun and Enjoyable Game for Passing Time!!!

Objective of the Game: 

- Don't let the Ball Fall!

- Bounce The Ball off the Paddle to earn points!

- If you drop the ball, you lose

- Let's See who can get the Highest Score!

btw, this is my first game ever, i know it is basic and not very good, but i hope you enjoy :)

- ThunderKnight
